title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your attitude sets the tone for the day, so dont let minor glitches or snafus bring you down. Unfortunately, its all too easy to obsess over the things that go wrong and lose sight of a larger goal. Thankfully, the stabilizing trine between mighty Mars and steadfast Saturn endows you with the grit to overcome tough obstacles. However, your worries about whether youre getting every little detail right is what can defeat you now. Trust your own flow if youre enjoying your groove and what you do looks right in your eyes. Build your foundation on integrity and hard work. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
